home.about_text: I am Rodrigo Chavarry, a passionate Software Development student. My focus in programming is characterized by meticulousness and responsibility, and I excel in database management. The ability of programming to transform processes and automate tasks fills me with enthusiasm. I aspire to drive the advancement of technologies, and in addition to programming, I am drawn to the world of hardware, extreme sports, and video games. I believe in the importance of actions over words, and I am excited about the path that lies ahead of me.
